XScaler Struct Reference

#include <xscaler.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The XScaler driver instance data. An instance must be allocated for each Scaler device in use.


Public Attributes

XScaler_Config Config
u32 IsReady
XScaler_CallBack EventCallBack
